snippet: The Syrian president, Bashar al-Assad, saw the ouster of the Egyptian president, Mohamed Morsi, as a vindication of his government’s fight against the two-year Syrian uprising.
abstract: Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad declares that ouster of Egyptian Pres Mohamed Morsi signifies fall of 'political Islam' and vindication of his government's fight against the two-year Syrian uprising.
lead_paragraph: The Syrian president, Bashar al-Assad, saw the ouster of the Egyptian president, Mohamed Morsi, as a vindication of his government’s fight against the two-year Syrian uprising.

headline.main: Syrian Leader Is Jubilant at Morsi’s Fall
headline.print_headline: Syrian Leader Is Jubilant At Morsi’s Fall
